title: Colosseum
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,722 words, Level Z1 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1090L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and U
description: Almost two thousand years ago, ancient Romans went to the Colosseum to be entertained by gladiator battles and exotic animals. Explore many aspects of the important landmark, including its construction cultural significance, fall into ruin, and renovation.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
